review: I bought this to replace a Roku 2.  The one thing which I noticed, and which one other reviewer has commented, is that the picture is MUCH cleaner than with the Roku 2.  Same setup, same cable, same TV, but sharper image for the exact same picture.  Audio is via the optical cable, very nice.  Got it mainly for the gaming, will report on that later, but in general, I am very happy with the device.  ps: when I set it up, Netflix wouldn't work.  I reported this via the help menu, an Amazon representative called me back within 30 seconds, and then talked me through the fix in a few minutes (I had to download a software update and reboot the device).  Most impressive to be able to talk to a person, never reached anyone so quickly with Verizon (ha!, takes half an hour).
author: Kindle Customer

review: I love the Amazon fire TV. I have previously used a PS3 and the WII for streaming TV and this is so much better. The picture quality is better and it is so much easier to use. And if you subscribe to Amazon Prime you can use voice recognition that works very well. You can also listen to your music through this and on most songs the lyrics appear on the TV which is a really cool feature. It also has a lot of great apps. One of my favorite that I have found is an app that has a bunch of documentaries. The app is free. During the movies there are commercials, but they are not very long and for free what do you expect. Also I can control the videos from my Amazon fire tablet. So if I am in my room and my 5 year old wants a different cartoon on in the other room, I don't even have to get up. I just pick up my tablet and change it from there. I would recommend the Amazon Fire TV to anyone.

review: This device is revolutionary... Amazon connects the entire world to you because Amazon is not limited to one single service like streaming in an explosively fast and simple to use device.  By fast, I mean faster than everything else including cable, satellite, or other similar devices.  The voice option that comes with the Fire TV is a must and makes life so much easier.  This device is small enough to be inconspicuous wherever you place it, yet large enough to be the device you use the most with your TV.  Combined with Amazon Prime, there is nothing you can't do.
